titlestmt.titleproper: Adams, Brooks, 1848-1927. Correspondence with Henry Adams (MS Am 1751): Guide.

change.item: hou00969 converted by Harvard University Library OIS from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.xsl (sy2006-06-08).

titlepage.titleproper: Adams, Brooks, 1848-1927. Correspondence with Henry Adams: Guide.
titlepage.author: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library
titlepage.p: Â© 2003 The President and Fellows of Harvard College

did.repository: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library, Harvard University
did.abstract: Correspondence of the American historian Brooks Adams to American novelist Henry Adams, as well as materials concerning the Adams' family.

acqinfo.p: Gift of Mrs. Robert Homans, 280 Beacon Street Boston, Massachusetts; received: 1947 September 15; 1948 November 30; 1948 January 5.

bioghist.p: Brooks Adams was an American historian. Henry Adams was an American novelist, historian, and social critic.

scopecontent.p: Also includes a lengthy critique by Henry Adams of an unpublished biography by Brooks Adams of John Quincy Adams, miscellaneous correspondence of Brooks Adams, letters from Charles Francis Adams to Brooks and Henry Adams.

did.unittitle: Adams, Brooks, 1848-1927. 287 T.L.s. and A.L.s. and 2 fragments (signed variously) to Henry Adams; [v.p.] 1887-1916.

note.p: Note: in this list, pieces all or mostly autograph are marked (A) those all or mostly typescript are marked (T).

did.unittitle: Quincy, 19 May 1907. 1l., with suggested codicil for will of Henry Adams
Adams, Brooks, 1848-1927. A.L.s.(Brooks Adams) to [] Brett; Bath [Me.] 17 Nov 1896.
Adams, Brooks, 1848-1927. A.L.s.(Brooks Adams) to Mrs. [] Baker; Quincy 28 Oct 1913.
Adams, Brooks, 1848-1927. A.L.s.(Brooks Adams) to Miss [] Tone; Boston, 5 Nov 1916.
Abbott, Samuel A B A.L.s.(Saml. A. B. Abbott) to Henry Adams; Ponte Milvio [Italy] 29 Nov 1912.
Koopman, Harry Lyman, 1860- A.L.s.(H. L. Koopman) to Henry Adams; Providence, R.I., 22 Jan 1912.
Norcross, Grenville H. A.L.s.(Grenville H. Norcross) to Brooks Adams; [Boston] 31 Mar 1910.
Bebel, August, 1840-1913. A.L.s.(A. Bebel) to []; Berlin, 2 Nov 1899.
Towne, Charles Arnette, 1858- A.L.s.(Chas. A. Towne) to [Brooks] Adams; Delano, Minn., 16 Oct 1896.

note.p: Was enclosed with letter of Brooks to Henry Adams, 19 Oct 1896. (q.v.)

did.unittitle: Adams, Charles Francis, 1835-1915. T.L.s.(Charles F. Adams) to Henry Adams; 12 Dec 1905.
Adams, Charles Francis, 1866- T.L.s.(C. F. Adams 2nd) to Henry Adams; 7 Jul 1896.
Adams, Charles Francis, 1866- T.L.s.(C. F. Adams 2nd.) to Brooks Adams; 13 Nov 1901.
Adams, Mary (Ogden) A.L.s.(Mary Ogden Adams) to Henry [Adams]; S. Lincoln, Mass., 8 Oct 1915.
Adams, Evelyn (Davis) 4 A.LL.s.(variously) to Henry [Adams]; [v.p., v.d.]
Adams, Henry, 1838-1918. 3 A.LL.s.(variously) to Brooks [Adams]; [v.p. v.d.]

note.p: Enclosing his critique (82l.) on an unpublished biography by Brooks Adams of John Quincy Adams.

did.unittitle: Lodge, Henry Cabot, 1850-1924. T.L.s.(H. C. Lodge) to Brooks Adams; [Washington] 22 Jan 1920.
Adams, Brooks, 1848-1927. 3 L.s. to Abigail [(Adams) Homans]; [v.p.],; 8 Apr. - 25 May 1898.

note.p: The letters deal with the opening phases of the Spanish-American war.

did.unittitle: Adams, John Quincy, 1833-1894. 10 A.L.s. to Charles Francis Adams; [v.p.]; 7 Jan. - 30 Dec. 1861.
Adams, John Quincy, 1833-1894. 6 A.L.s. to Charles Francis Adams; [v.p.]; 7 Jan. - 30 Dec. 1861.
Adams, Henry, 1838-1918. 140 A.L.s. and 2 fragments to Brooks Adams; [v.p.]; 5 Jun 1895 - 10 Feb. 1914.
Adams, Henry, 1838-1918. A.L.s. to Mrs. Brooks Adams; [Paris, 29 May 1911].
